text: Anne-Marie Garat (9 October 1946 – 26 July 2022) was a French novelist. She won the Prix Femina for her novel Aden in 1992 and the for her novel Les mal famées. Garat died of cancer on 26 July 2022 in Paris, France at the age of 75.Décès d’Anne-Marie Garat, écrivaine et jurée du prix Femina ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site of Anne Marie Garat Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French novelists Category:Writers from Bordeaux Category:Writers from Paris Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:20th- century novelists Category:21st-century novelists
title: Anne-Marie Garat
